project.name: Penumbra
project.description: Personal library management application with ISBN-based book importing and advanced filtering

conventions.serverComponents: Use Server Components by default, Client Components only when needed

bestPractices: Always filter data by user ID for multi-tenant isolation
Use Prisma transactions for consistency when needed
Implement proper error handling in server actions
Follow Material-UI theming for consistent UI
Use TypeScript types for all props and function parameters
Validate user input on both client and server side
Keep components small and focused (single responsibility)
Use Server Components for data fetching, Client Components for interactivity

subagents.description: Specialized subagents for different development tasks - see subagents.json for details
subagents.usage: Mention the subagent name in your request (e.g., 'Use the frontend-dev subagent to...')
